trans-unit.source: Contains information about the changes that occur in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.TextChanged"></xref> event.
A TextChange object specifies where a change occurred in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.Offset%2A> property specifies the position of the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.AddedLength%2A> property specifies how many symbols were added, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.RemovedLength%2A> property specifies how many symbols were removed.
When the change occurs in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, a symbol is a single character.
When a change occurs in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, a symbol is one of the following: - An opening or closing tag for a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> element.
- A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element contained within an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>.

Note that such a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are not counted as symbols.
- Each 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] character inside of a text <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> element.
TextChange is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been added to the control.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The number of symbols that have been added to the control.
Gets or sets the position at which the change occurred.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The position at which the change occurred.
Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been removed from the control.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The number of symbols that have been removed from the control.
